title: Add support to reminder/alarm API to be able to have reminders only occure for specific days of week
body: It would be extremely helpful if the reminder/alarm API supported creating a reminder for specific days of the week.

comments.body:
Hello fellow Windows Platform Developers, please refer to this similar thread requesting for an improved Alarm/Reminder APIs:
